stepAnswer: Enter at least $$2$$ instances of the series.
stepTitle: You are trying to quickly create an ordered number series in a column that increments by $$3$$. What action do you need to take?
answerLatex: Enter at least $$2$$ instances of the series.
choices: Enter at least $$3$$ instances of the series.
Enter the starting number, then enter "+3" in each cell of the column series.
Enter the formula "=SUM(X+3)" in the cells required.
Enter at least $$2$$ instances of the series.
